snippet: Amnesty International said it was unconscionable that a drug offender who was hospitalized to recuperate for a rehanging would be subjected to such punishment and asked Iran to spare his life.
abstract: Iranian judge orders convicted drug felon who survived hanging to be hospitalized until he is well enough to be hanged again; human rights advocates argue that he should be spared.
lead_paragraph: Amnesty International said it was unconscionable that a drug offender who was hospitalized to recuperate for a rehanging would be subjected to such punishment and asked Iran to spare his life.

headline.main: After Man Survives Hanging, Iran Plans a Second Attempt
headline.print_headline: After Man Survives Hanging, Iran Plans a Second Attempt

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
